  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2059</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2059</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">I per escriure la a i la e neutres?</string>
            <string language="en">What about neutral 'a' and 'e' when writing?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was über Neutrales ' a ' und ' e ' wann 
schreibend?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Que diriez-vous du point mort 'a 'et 'e 'quand 
écrivant ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que sobre o ponto morto ' a ' e ' e ' quando que 
escreve?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa circa neutrale 'a 'e 'e 'quando che 
scrive?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι γίνεται με το ουδέτερο "α" και "το ε" πότε που 
γράφει;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta (PAR) sobre recursos útils per diferenciar la a i la e neutres. Adreçat a l'alumnat de final de cicle mitjà i a l'alumnat de cicle superior.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) on useful tips for distinguishing between neutral 'a' and 'e'. Aimed at 9- to 12-year-olds.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ortografia</string>
            <string language="en">spelling</string>
            <string language="es">ortografía</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie und antworten Sie (GLEICHHEIT) auf nützlichen 
Spitzen für das Unterscheiden zwischen Neutralem ' a ' und ' e '. 
Angestrebte 9 zu 12-year-olds.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Interrogez et répondez (PAIR) sur des extrémités utiles
pour distinguer le point mort 'a 'et 'e '. 9 visés à 
12-year-olds.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questione e responda (PAR) em pontas úteis distinguindo 
entre o ponto morto ' a ' e ' e '. 9- visados a 12-year-olds.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risponda a (PAR) sulle punte utili per la 
distinzione fra il neutrale 'a 'e 'e '. 9 puntati su a 
12-year-olds.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) στις χρήσιμες άκρες για τη 
διάκριση μεταξύ του ουδέτερου "α" και "του ε". Στοχευμένος 
σε 9 στο 12-έτος.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rechtschreibung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">épellation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">soletração</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ortografia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ορθογραφία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
